verses.verse: In the third<WH7969> year<WH8141> of the reign<WH4438> of king<WH4428> Belshazzar<WH1112> a vision<WH2377> appeared<WH7200> unto<WH413> me, even unto me<WH589> Daniel,<WH1840> after that<WH310> which appeared<WH7200> unto<WH413> me at the first.<WH8462>

And I saw<WH7200> in a vision;<WH2377> and it came to pass,<WH1961> when I saw,<WH7200> that I<WH589> was at Shushan<WH7800> in the palace,<WH1002> which<WH834> is in the province<WH4082> of Elam;<WH5867> and I saw<WH7200> in a vision,<WH2377> and I<WH589> was<WH1961> by<WH5921> the river<WH180> of Ulai.<WH195>

Then I lifted up<WH5375> mine eyes,<WH5869> and saw,<WH7200> and, behold,<WH2009> there stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> the river<WH180> a<WH259> ram<WH352> which had two horns:<WH7161> and the two horns<WH7161> were high;<WH1364> but one<WH259> was higher<WH1364> than<WH4480> the other,<WH8145> and the higher<WH1364> came up<WH5927> last.<WH314>

I saw<WH7200> <WH853> the ram<WH352> pushing<WH5055> westward,<WH3220> and northward,<WH6828> and southward;<WH5045> so that no<WH3808> <WH3605> beasts<WH2416> might stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> him, neither<WH369> was there any that could deliver<WH5337> out of his hand;<WH4480> <WH3027> but he did<WH6213> according to his will,<WH7522> and became great.<WH1431>

And as I<WH589> was<WH1961> considering,<WH995> behold,<WH2009> a he goat<WH6842> <WH5795> came<WH935> from<WH4480> the west<WH4628> on<WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the whole<WH3605> earth,<WH776> and touched<WH5060> not<WH369> the ground:<WH776> and the goat<WH6842> had a notable<WH2380> horn<WH7161> between<WH996> his eyes.<WH5869>

And he came<WH935> to<WH5704> the ram<WH352> that had<WH1167> two horns,<WH7161> which<WH834> I had seen<WH7200> standing<WH5975> before<WH6440> the river,<WH180> and ran<WH7323> unto<WH413> him in the fury<WH2534> of his power.<WH3581>

And I saw<WH7200> him come close<WH5060> unto<WH681> the ram,<WH352> and he was moved with anger<WH4843> against<WH413> him, and smote<WH5221> <WH853> the ram,<WH352> and broke<WH7665> <WH853> his two<WH8147> horns:<WH7161> and there was<WH1961> no<WH3808> power<WH3581> in the ram<WH352> to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> him, but he cast him down<WH7993> to the ground,<WH776> and stamped upon<WH7429> him: and there was<WH1961> none<WH3808> that could deliver<WH5337> the ram<WH352> out of his hand.<WH4480> <WH3027>

Therefore the he goat<WH6842> <WH5795> waxed very great:<WH1431> <WH5704> <WH3966> and when he was strong,<WH6105> the great<WH1419> horn<WH7161> was broken;<WH7665> and for<WH8478> it came up<WH5927> four<WH702> notable ones<WH2380> toward the four<WH702> winds<WH7307> of heaven.<WH8064>

And out of<WH4480> one<WH259> of<WH4480> them came forth<WH3318> a<WH259> little<WH4480> <WH4704> horn,<WH7161> which waxed exceeding great,<WH1431> <WH3499> toward<WH413> the south,<WH5045> and toward<WH413> the east,<WH4217> and toward<WH413> the pleasant<WH6643> land.

And it waxed great,<WH1431> even to<WH5704> the host<WH6635> of heaven;<WH8064> and it cast down<WH5307> some of<WH4480> the host<WH6635> and of<WH4480> the stars<WH3556> to the ground,<WH776> and stamped upon<WH7429> them.

Yea, he magnified<WH1431> himself even to<WH5704> the prince<WH8269> of the host,<WH6635> and by<WH4480> him the daily<WH8548> sacrifice was taken away,<WH7311> and the place<WH4349> of his sanctuary<WH4720> was cast down.<WH7993>

And a host<WH6635> was given<WH5414> him against<WH5921> the daily<WH8548> sacrifice by reason of transgression,<WH6588> and it cast down<WH7993> the truth<WH571> to the ground;<WH776> and it practiced,<WH6213> and prospered.<WH6743>

Then I heard<WH8085> one<WH259> saint<WH6918> speaking,<WH1696> and another<WH259> saint<WH6918> said<WH559> unto that certain<WH6422> saint which spoke,<WH1696> How long<WH5704> <WH4970> shall be the vision<WH2377> concerning the daily<WH8548> sacrifice, and the transgression<WH6588> of desolation,<WH8074> to give<WH5414> both the sanctuary<WH6944> and the host<WH6635> to be trodden under foot?<WH4823>
And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, Unto<WH5704> two thousand<WH505> and three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> days;<WH6153> <WH1242> then shall the sanctuary<WH6944> be cleansed.<WH6663>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> when I, even I<WH589> Daniel,<WH1840> had seen<WH7200> <WH853> the vision,<WH2377> and sought<WH1245> for the meaning,<WH998> then, behold,<WH2009> there stood<WH5975> before<WH5048> me as the appearance<WH4758> of a man.<WH1397>

And I heard<WH8085> a man's<WH120> voice<WH6963> between<WH996> the banks of Ulai,<WH195> which called,<WH7121> and said,<WH559> Gabriel,<WH1403> make this<WH1975> man to understand<WH995> <WH853> the vision.<WH4758>

So he came<WH935> near<WH681> where I stood:<WH5977> and when he came,<WH935> I was afraid,<WH1204> and fell<WH5307> upon<WH5921> my face:<WH6440> but he said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, Understand,<WH995> O son<WH1121> of man:<WH120> for<WH3588> at the time<WH6256> of the end<WH7093> shall be the vision.<WH4758>

Now as he was speaking<WH1696> with<WH5973> me, I was in a deep sleep<WH7290> on<WH5921> my face<WH6440> toward the ground:<WH776> but he touched<WH5060> me, and set<WH5975> me upright.<WH5921> <WH5977>

And he said,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> I will make thee know<WH3045> <WH853> what<WH834> shall be<WH1961> in the last end<WH319> of the indignation:<WH2195> for<WH3588> at the time appointed<WH4150> the end<WH7093> shall be.
The ram<WH352> which<WH834> thou sawest<WH7200> having<WH1167> two horns<WH7161> are the kings<WH4428> of Media<WH4074> and Persia.<WH6539>
And the rough<WH8163> goat<WH6842> is the king<WH4428> of Greece:<WH3120> and the great<WH1419> horn<WH7161> that<WH834> is between<WH996> his eyes<WH5869> is the first<WH7223> king.<WH4428>

Now that being broken,<WH7665> whereas four<WH702> stood up<WH5975> for<WH8478> it, four<WH702> kingdoms<WH4438> shall stand up<WH5975> out of the nation,<WH4480> <WH1471> but not<WH3808> in his power.<WH3581>

And in the latter time<WH319> of their kingdom,<WH4438> when the transgressors<WH6586> are come to the full,<WH8552> a king<WH4428> of fierce<WH5794> countenance,<WH6440> and understanding<WH995> dark sentences,<WH2420> shall stand up.<WH5975>

And his power<WH3581> shall be mighty,<WH6105> but not<WH3808> by his own power:<WH3581> and he shall destroy<WH7843> wonderfully,<WH6381> and shall prosper,<WH6743> and practice,<WH6213> and shall destroy<WH7843> the mighty<WH6099> and the holy<WH6918> people.<WH5971>

And through<WH5921> his policy<WH7922> also he shall cause craft<WH4820> to prosper<WH6743> in his hand;<WH3027> and he shall magnify<WH1431> himself in his heart,<WH3824> and by peace<WH7962> shall destroy<WH7843> many:<WH7227> he shall also stand up<WH5975> against<WH5921> the Prince<WH8269> of princes;<WH8269> but he shall be broken<WH7665> without<WH657> hand.<WH3027>

And the vision<WH4758> of the evening<WH6153> and the morning<WH1242> which<WH834> was told<WH559> is true:<WH571> wherefore shut thou up<WH859> <WH5640> the vision;<WH2377> for<WH3588> it shall be for many<WH7227> days.<WH3117>

And I<WH589> Daniel<WH1840> fainted,<WH1961> and was sick<WH2470> certain days;<WH3117> afterward I rose up,<WH6965> and did<WH6213> <WH853> the king's<WH4428> business;<WH4399> and I was astonished<WH8074> at<WH5921> the vision,<WH4758> but none<WH369> understood<WH995> it.
